Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Si koyenera kuti Mulungu ayankhule ndi munthu kupatula kudzera m’chivumbulutso kapena kuchokera kumalo obisika kapena potumiza Mtumwi kudzawauza, chimene Mulungu afuna ndi chilolezo chake. Ndithudi Iye ndi wapamwamba ndi wanzeru zosatha

Kotero, mwaulamuliro wathu, tatumiza chivumbulutso chathu kwa iwe. Iwe siumadziwa kuti chivumbulutso chidali chiyani kapena kuti chikhulupiriro chidali chiyani. Koma Ife tachipanga icho kukhala muuni umene timatsogolera nawo akapolo athu mwachifuniro chathu. Ndithudi iwe umalangiza anthu ku njira yoyenera
Njira ya Mulungu amene ali Mwini wake wa chilichonse chimene chili mlengalenga ndi chilichonse chimene chili pa dziko lapansi. Ndithudi kwa Mulungu zinthu zonse zimabwerera
Ha mim
Ndilumbira pali Buku limene limafotokoza zinthu mosabisa
Ndithudi talipanga ilo kukhala Korani yam’chinenero cha Chiarabu kuti iwe ukhoza kulizindikira
Ndithudi ilo lili mu Make Buku limene lili pamaso pathu, lolemekezeka ndi lodzala ndi nzeru
Kodi Ife tisiye kukukumbutsani inu nonse chifukwa chakuti ndinu anthu osasamala ndi oswa malamulo
Kodi ndi Atumwi angati amene Ife tidatumiza ku mitundu ya anthu akale
Ndipo kwa iwo sikunadze Mtumwi amene iwo sadamunyoze
Kotero Ife tidawaononga, anthu amphamvu kuposa awa, ndipo chitsanzo cha anthu onse akale chadutsa
Ndithudi ngati iwe ukawafunsa kuti, “Kodi ndani adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi?” Iwo, ndithudi, adzakuyankha kuti, “Mwini mphamvu ndi Mwini wodziwa ndiye amene adazilenga.”
Iye ndi amene adalenga dziko kukhala malo anu a mpumulo ndipo adaika mu ilo njira kuti inu mukhoza kutsogozedwa bwino
Ndipo ndiye amene amatumiza mvula kuchokera kumitambo molingana ndi muyeso. Ndipo Ife timadzutsa nthaka imene idali yakufa ndi iyo, kotero nanunso mudzadzutsidwa chimodzimodzi
Ndipo ndiye amene adalenga zinthu ziwiriziwiri ndipo adapanga zombo ndi nyama kuti muzikwera

Kuti inu mukhoza kukhala okhazikika pa misana pawo ndi kukumbukira ubwino wa Ambuye wanu pamene mumakhazikikapo ndi kunena kuti, “Ulemerero ukhale kwa Iye amene adazipanga izo kukhala zopanda mphamvu kwa ife ndipo ife sitikadatha kutero.”
“Ndithudi kwa Ambuye wathu ife tidzabwerera.”
Komabe iwo amawapatsa ena mwa akapolo ake gawo lake. Ndithudi munthu ndi wosayamika
Kodi Iye wadzisankhira ana aakazi kuchokera ku zimene walenga ndipo adakusankhani inu kukhala ndi ana aamuna
Ndipo ngati wina wa iwo auzidwa nkhani za chimene Iye amati ndi chofanana ndi Mulungu, nkhope yake imada ndipo amakhala wokwiya
Icho ndi chimene chidapangidwa ngati chosangalatsa ndipo pa mtsutso, icho sichingathe kuyankhula bwinobwino
Ndipo iwo amasandutsa angelo amene ali akapolo a Mulungu, kukhala akazi. Kodi iwo adaonerera chilengedwe chawo? Umboni wawo udzalembedwa ndipo iwo adzafunsidwa
Ndipo iwo adati, “Chikadakhala chifuniro cha Mwini Chisoni Chosatha, ife sitikadapembedza milungu ina.” Iwo sadziwa china chilichonse chokhudza chimenechi. Ndipo iwo amangonama chabe
Kodi kapena Ife tidawapatsa Buku lina ili lisanadze limene iwo ali kukhulupilira
Iyayi! Iwo amati, “Ife tidapeza makolo athu ali kutsatira njira ina ndi chipembedzo china chake ndipo ife timatsogozedwa potsatira zimene iwo amachita.”

Ndipo Ife sitidatumize Mchenjezi iwe usanadze kwa anthu ena, koma achuma amene anali kukhala pakati pawo ankati; “Ife tidapeza makolo athu ali kutsatira njira yina ndi chipembedzo china chake ndipo ndithudi ife tidzatsatira zimene iwo anali kuchita.”
